    M5 Forecasting challenges

    Create a 3-dimensional array out of a data.frame

    as_3d_array.Rd

    Create a 3-dimensional array out of a data.frame

    Usage

    as_3d_array(data, index, key)

    Examples

    library(tsibbledata)
library(dplyr)
#>

global_economy

 global_economy %>%
 select(Country, Year, Imports, Exports)
